a.n: Teen Titans Go! Where Exactly on The Globe is Carl Sanpedro VI

p.k: Where Exactly on the Globe Is Carl Sanpedro Part 1 / Where Exactly on the Globe Is Carl Sanpedro Part 2 / Where Exactly on the Globe Is Carl Sanpedro Part 3 / Where Exactly on the Globe Is Carl Sanpedro Part 4 The Titans fly to Los Angeles but end up in San Pedro, where Berto tells them about the villainous long shoreman, Carl Sanpedro. / Carl Sanpedro has struck again, this time in Jamaica, so the Titans take off for the Caribbean. / The Titans travel to India to stop Carl Sanpedro and learn about the sport of cricket. / In the final epic showdown with Carl Sanpedro, the Titans head to Croatia, the home of dragons and ice zombies.
